back i find these a quick knit - perfect for when i just don t feel like working in the round and they ve proved popular with mums and babies alike you will need 3 25 mm us 3 straight knitting needles or size needed to obtain required gauge/gauge 2 x 3mm us 2 ½ double pointed needles or 1 size down from those used to knit the bootees 1 x 50g ball of baruffa pura lana dk 115 m /126 yds note this 100% merino yarn knits to a gauge/gauge of 22sts x 30 row on 4mm us 6 needles in stock st if you choose to use a different yarn this may alter the appearance of your finished bootees and the amount of yarn required 4 ring markers 1 embroidery/darning needle note i find a row counter very useful and a safety pin might be handy too 1 copyright ©2010 2015 maryjane thompson gauge/gauge 26sts x 36 row
